attributes.additional_details: In view of the pending food shortage in the UK in particular meat and thousands of people having to use food banks, we call on the Government to remove all meat menus from the House of Commons in the subsided restaurants and to remove the subsidery for all members who earn over £60.000 in line with the child benefit as it is unaffordable for tax payers to continue to meet these unnecessary expensives when members earn sufficient to pay the full price for their meals and wine etc.
